title: Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger
description: West decided to sample Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger after first hearing the duo's work when touring in 2006.

title: Summer Vibes
description: Perfect track for those summer vibes. Smooth R&B with a modern twist.

title: Urban Jungle
description: Hard-hitting drill beat with unique sampling and punchy 808s.

title: Cloud Nine
description: Relaxing lo-fi beat perfect for studying or chilling. Features mellow piano samples and vintage drum patterns.

title: Future Funk
description: Modern take on classic funk sounds with electronic elements and groovy basslines.

title: Midnight Dreamer
description: Atmospheric trap beat with haunting melodies and hard-hitting drums. Perfect for late night vibes.

title: Soul Searchin'
description: Soulful hip hop beat with vintage vinyl samples and classic boom bap drums.
